column5: ZIOP you know what turns a stock is when shorts cover and start buying to make their money to drive up the price for them to wait for the price they want jump off and short the stock down but they make a stupid mistake and all the money they made going up lose their asses as the stock continues to climb where they were so sure they were supposed to short and buying higher drives the shorts into the ground if you catch them and squeeze the little millenial pimples off their faces
ZIOP it doesnt move up because youre buying the shorts will short your shares it moves up because the bears are covering buy higher ef the shorts dont feed them
ZIOP and keep buying when you see the whits in their eyes before this gapps up i just want to say FU shorties
ZIOP start buying when you see the stock going up because the shorts need to cover do not buy here buy higher
ZIOP if nobody buys shares the shorts cant short into the price they are fishing at 420 418 hold tight do not buy if you already have your shares 428 from 418 422 the top bollinger band opens up
ZIOP Adding a little more to stay even before the move up I think people might be surprised tomorrow as it will show why it should be acquired This will rip higher soon
